workoutProgrammes.title: StrongLifts 5x5 (Mixed Gender)
workoutProgrammes.info:
Monday - workout A
Squat 5x5
Bench Press 5x5
Barbell Row 5x5

Wednesday - workout B
Squat 5x5
Overhead Press 5x5
Deadlift 1x5

Friday - Workout A
Squat 5x5
Bench Press 5x5
Barbell Row 5x5
